info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued February 21 at 9:49PM CST until February 22 at 2:00AM CST by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 PM CST FOR CALLAHAN...SOUTHEASTERN JONES...SOUTHEASTERN SHACKELFORD AND NORTHEASTERN TAYLOR COUNTIES... At 949 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Lake Fort Phantom Hill to near Dudley, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Abilene, Clyde, Albany, Baird, Moran, Putnam, Eula, Dudley, Hamby, Potosi, Impact, Mccarty Lake, Lake Fort Phantom Hill, Admiral, Us- 283 Near The Callahan-Shackelford County Line and I- 20 Near The Callahan-Eastland County Line. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 284 and 323. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
